document_data.name: Scrivenscry
document_data.mainbody: '''Scrivenscry''' was a conceited [[arcanaloth]] who traveled the [[plane]]s in order to locate the ''[[Books of Keeping]]''.
document_data.Description: Scrivenscry referred to itself in third-person, and enjoyed [[licorice]]. The arcanaloth was ferocious and heinous, especially to those in service to it.
document_data.Relationships: It had in its servitude a nervous, albino, blind, ''[[awaken]]ed'' [[giant penguin]] called [[Kingsport]].
document_data.Possessions: The arcanaloth owned a ''[[chime of opening]]'', and three spell [[scroll]]s.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[fiend]] made its way to the [[Prime Material Plane]]. It sought out four tomes containing the true names of every [[yugoloth]] in existence.
